name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: What's the neighborhood like?
response: The neighbborhood is one of the best place in casablanca. Near to the most famous mosque in the world, the biggest in Africa, the mosquee hassan II is just a few minutes away, there is no other hotel or residence nearer. In front of the door, you can see the exhibition center which hosts around 20 events per year. At 5 minutes, you get to old town, very authentic place, with good restaurant such as scala, rick"s caf√©. Maarif with the shopping and commercial areas such as the "twin center" which is very famous in casablanca is also few kilometers away, along with the train station, banks, hospital, business centers such as marina center, and malls. Finallly, you got to reach the corniche for having fun at the beach during day, or visit clubs for festive nightlife, it"s just few minutes away too. So your hotel is at a very centric spot ! All of those listed commodities are less than 10 minutes away by driving.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: How far is the hotel from the city center?
response: THE CITY CENTER IS 5 MINUTES BY CAR, AND 20 MINUTES BY WALK.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: Are there any public transportation options?
response:
It offers convenient transportation options like taxis, buses, and private drivers (exp : indrive, kareem ..). 
However, we suggest you to use small red taxis, that"s for us the best recommendation.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: Do you offer airport shuttle service?
response:
We work with an external service provider, the best option remains to take the big taxi or "white taxi",
 those are specialized in tarnsporting guests to and from the airport. We might reserve one for you.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: Can I arrange for a private transfer?
response:
We work with an external service provider, the best option remains to take the big taxi or "white taxi", 
those are specialized in tarnsporting guests to and from the airport. We might reserve one for you.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: Is parking available at the hotel, and if so, is there a fee?
response:
Hotel customers can access to the basement parking at level -2, and park their car for the whole stay for
 free. Cowork&Live customers would have to pay for reserving a spot. Notice that thee is plenty of space 
at public parkings outside, just at the corner of the hotel.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: Where is Cowork & Live located ?
response: 138, Bd Moulay Youssef - Casablanca

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: What are your working hours ?
response:
Cowork & Live is accessible 24/7 and the administrative working hours are 9-7 on the weekdays and 9-6 
on the weekends

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: How do I become a subscriber/member ?
response:
To register, the new member has to provide Cowork & Live with an ID document, then read and sign 3
 documents that confirm the subscription, which are : Service agreement, General terms and conditions
 of Sale and the pricing list.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: What other services are offered alongside coworking spaces ?
response: Gym, gaming spaces, kitchennettes, prayer room, nap room, salon & spa and restaurant

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: What is the booking process for your different services ?
response:
Reservations can currently be made by phone at +212 662 641 479 or by email at
 contact@coworklive.ma, while our website is being finalized. Once completed, the process will be fully
 automated and self-service.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: How many offices do you have ?
response:
Cowork & Live has a total of 30 private offices, 17 of it are ones of one position per office, 12 have two 
positions per office and the largest one have 4 position in one office. In addition to 14 meeting rooms of 
different capacities ; from a single person per meeting room to rooms that can accommodate up to 120
 people

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: How can I proceed to the payment ?
response: We accept various forms of payment, including credit cards, cash, and checks.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: Do I have to pay a monthly fee ?
response: We offer various subscription types ranging from daily passes to weekly, monthly, annual, and more.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: Can I upgrade or downgrade our membership ?
response: Yes, Cowork & Live is very flexible and adapts to the member"s needs, according to their availability.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: How can I cancel the Service Agreement ?
response: The member needs to send a written notice to Cowork & Live.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: Do you organize networking events ?
response:
Yes, we occasionally host networking events, workshops, and seminars to help our members connect, 
learn, and grow professionally. We strive to do our best in organizing these events. Meanwhile,
we host different networking events that might be very interesting as well.

name: Melliber Hotel Staging
question: How can I stay informed about the upcoming events ?
response:
Once the subscription is complete, the member"s email address has already been collected, 
and the information will be sent days before the event.

question: Is the parking available ?
response: We offer parking spaces accessible 24/7 according to a monthly subscription.
